workflow.title: Seamless 5-Step Workflow
workflow.subtitle: From concept to compliance in record time.

step1.title2: Import your site and floor plans directly to start your project right away
step1.desc: Previously, you had to import drawings to scale, manually trace lines on top, and configure initial settings. Now, with iOS RoomPlan or AI-powered floor plan recognition, spatial data is automatically extracted — so you can spend the time once used for "setup" on "review and simulation" instead.
step1.feature2: AI floor plan recognition with auto scale/coordinate alignment

step2.title2: Complete environment setup quickly and error-free with natural language and libraries
step2.desc: Simulation environment setup involves many input parameters with interdependencies, making repetitive tasks and small errors easy to accumulate. BUL:C standardizes environment configuration through MCP-based natural language setup and standardized libraries, reducing setup time while improving both reusability and simulation accuracy.

step3.title2: Cut simulation time by 87x with GPU Solver
step3.desc: Fire simulation is a compute-intensive task involving repeated large-scale matrix operations. BUL:C features a purpose-built Solver designed to process these operations on GPUs, dramatically reducing simulation wait times — up to 87x faster based on our internal benchmarks.

step4.title2: Automatically analyze ASET/RSET and instantly verify compliance
step4.desc: Evacuation simulation results go beyond simply reviewing outputs — they require quantitative assessment of safety margins from both fire code and ASET/RSET perspectives. BUL:C automatically analyzes simulation results against regulatory criteria and the ASET/RSET framework, rapidly deriving key metrics and conclusions needed for decision-making.

step5.desc: Stop struggling with screenshots and Word documents. BUL:C generates professional, interactive web-based reports and standard PDFs that clearly communicate safety outcomes.

faqs.question: How many devices can I use with one account?
faqs.answer: You can register up to 3 devices per account (desktops, laptops, etc.).

faqs.question: What if I change or reinstall my PC?
faqs.answer:
You can re-register your device without any issues.
However, for security purposes, there is a daily limit on the number of device changes.

faqs.question: Can I log in from multiple locations at the same time?
faqs.answer:
Simultaneous use is limited to 1 session.
If you are already logged in elsewhere, you can log in from a new device and the previous session will be automatically terminated (force logout).

faqs.question: What is "force logout"?
faqs.answer: When you log in from a new device, any existing active session is automatically terminated. This means you will almost never be locked out due to a stuck session.
